
{{alias}}( value, shape )
    Returns a filled n-dimensional nested array.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Fill value.

    shape: Array<integer>
        Array shape.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Array
        Output array.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( 0.0, [ 1, 3 ] )
    [ [ 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 ] ]

    See Also
    --------
